atlantis_talk_01_02_rival_01:
So, Penny! How’d you wind up friends with
[trnm:0], anyway?[npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_01_02_botan_01:
Huh? Well, uh... I guess [s:g]he just really came
through for me when I needed h[im;er:g].[npcn:8]
atlantis_talk_01_02_botan_02:
Everything was going off the rails. School was a
mess, and my friendships...well, ditto.[npcn:8]
atlantis_talk_01_02_botan_03:
[trnm:0] was a big help getting
all that sorted out.[npcn:8]
atlantis_talk_01_02_rival_02:
Guau! So [s:g]he helped you out too while [s:g]he was
tackling all the Gyms? That’s awesome![npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_01_02_rival_03:
[trnm:0] and I are classmates!
Neighbors back home, too![npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_01_02_rival_04:
Plus, I said [s:g]he should aim to be a Champion,
and [s:g]he did it! So now I’ve got a Champion bud![npcn:4]
atlantis_talk_01_02_friend_01: Hold it right there, you two.[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_01_02_friend_02:
You think YOU’VE got cool friendship origin
stories with [trnm:0]?[npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_01_02_friend_03:
They’re nothing compared to what me and h[im;er:g]
went through! Our friendship’s on another level![npcn:6]
atlantis_talk_01_02_botan_06: Um, nobody asked you. Stop trying to flex on us.[npcn:8]
atlantis_talk_01_02_rival_05:
Hahaha! Guess we’re all in the “buds with
[trnm:0]” club![npcn:4]
